page.title: 11Life-styles: Rosneath (2)
page.content: FASHION:Many women and girls wear trousers at some time but most people's clothing is ordinary and casual and doesn't change much. The exception is some children and teen- agers who wear denims, leather jack- ets and trousers, jump suits-all with lots of zips, batwing jumpers, long tight skirts and trousers, luminous socks, 3/4 length trousers, string vests, ankle boots, slip-on shoes with pointed toes, Doc Martin lace-up boots for boys and girls get a complete wardrobe of clothes at jumble sales or Oxfam shops. There they buy shoes, paint them and put on patterns. BEAUTY:Some teenagers dye their hair pink, orange, green etc.and wear it spiked, crew cut, shaved or mohican. They also paint finger and toe nails in pop colours-every finger different.
